original: yādṛśyā ca śakro devānām indro divyaiḥ paribhogaiḥ samarpitaḥ samaṃ tvaṃ gībhūta iti |
analyzed: yādṛśyā ca śakraḥ devānām indraḥ divyaiḥ paribhogaiḥ samarpitaḥ samam tvam gībhūtaḥ iti

original: atha mañjuśrīs te strīpuruṣadāraka-dārikās tasyāṃ vaiḍūryamayyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ trayastriṃśadbhavanasya vaijayantasya prāsādasya śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā añjalipragṛhaṃ kuryuḥ |
analyzed: atha mañjuśrīḥ te strī puruṣa dāraka dārikāḥ tasyām vaiḍūrya mayyām mahā pṛthivyām trayastriṃśat bhavanasya vaijayantasya prāsādasya śakrasya devānām indrasya pratibhāsam dṛṣṭvā añjali pragṛham kuryuḥ

original: puṣpāṇi ca kṣityaraṃ gandhāṃś ca kṣityarann evaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣante |
analyzed: puṣpāṇi ca kṣityaram gandhān ca kṣityaran evam vācam bhāṣante

original: vayam apy evaṃ rūpā bhavema yādṛśaḥ |
analyzed: vayam api evam rūpāḥ bhavema yādṛśaḥ

original: śakro devānām indro vayam apy evaṃ vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema remema parivārayema yathāyaṃ śakro devānām indra iti ||
analyzed: śakraḥ devānām indraḥ vayam api evam vaijayante prāsāde krīḍema remema parivārayema yathā ayam śakraḥ devānām indraḥ iti

original: na ca te satvā evaṃ saṃjānanti sma |
analyzed: na ca te satvāḥ evam saṃjānanti sma

original: pratibhāso yaṃ vaiḍūryamayyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ yatra trayastriṃśadbhavanaṃ vaijayantaś ca prāsādaḥ |
analyzed: pratibhāsaḥ yam vaiḍūrya mayyām mahā pṛthivyām yatra trayastriṃśat bhavanam vaijayantaḥ ca prāsādaḥ

original: śakraś ca devānām indraḥ pariśuddhaḥ mehāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ |
analyzed: śakraḥ ca devānām indraḥ pariśuddhaḥ mehāvaiḍūryasya pratibhāsaḥ

original: te śakra tvam abhinandanto dānāni ca dadati puṇyāni ca kurvvanti |
analyzed: te śakra tvam abhinandantaḥ dānāni ca dadati puṇyāni ca kurvvanti

original: tatra ca trayastriṃśadbhavane pratibhāsa upapattaye kuśalamūlāni ca pariṇāmayanti |
analyzed: tatra ca trayastriṃśat bhavane pratibhāse upapattaye kuśala mūlāni ca pariṇāmayanti
